scripts.create:payer: cd src && ts-node cli.ts create payer
scripts.create:aggregator: cd src && ts-node cli.ts create aggregator
scripts.create:oracle: cd src && ts-node cli.ts create oracle
scripts.remove:payer: cd src && ts-node cli.ts remove payer
scripts.remove:aggregator: cd src && ts-node cli.ts remove aggregator
scripts.remove:oracle: cd src && ts-node cli.ts remove oracle
scripts.airdrop:payer: cd src && ts-node cli.ts airdrop payer
scripts.airdrop:aggregator: cd src && ts-node cli.ts airdrop aggregator
scripts.airdrop:oracle: cd src && ts-node cli.ts airdrop oracle
scripts.localnet:up: set -x; solana-localnet down; set -e; solana-localnet up
